name: hacker-proxy-pro
description: A lightweight, easy-to-use open source proxy switch for Bug Bounty Hunters, Pentesters, and Security Researchers. Developed by Zishan Ahamed Thandar.

scripts.pack: npm run build && cd dist/firefox && zip -r ../hacker-proxy-pro-firefox.xpi . && cd ../chrome && zip -r ../hacker-proxy-pro-chrome.zip .

author: Zishan Ahamed Thandar
